::Ramulus/Striker::

Ramulus grunts as the missiles hit his torso, sending him flying a few feet. 
He lands on his feet, raising his gun and firing at Injector before seeing 
the Oblitercons and the other preds arrive.

He growls. This was too much. He jumps up, flipping in the air, and landing 
in front of DarkMouse in time for Hell Beast's shot and several others to hit 
him.

"Let's get out of here!" He yells to the maximals around him, offering 
DarkMouse a hand to help her stand up.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker rolls behind another tree as missiles shred the one he was behind. He 
jumps out from behind it, his wolf beast form jumping across the battlefield 
to land near Ramhorn, grabbing him by an arm and dragging him off a bit.

"Yes, let's do," he replies to Ramulus as he sees the predacons arrive.
